Title: Can LeapTag Capture The Magic Of StumbleUpon?

Author: Goladus
Content: True but I'd really rather it be a bull than a bubble.  It's the nature of bubbles to burst eventually.

Author: pg
Title: Paul Kedrosky: DoubleClick acquisition aimed at cutting off Microsoft's air supply

Author: pepe
Content:
"After they paid back their angel investors, they had about a year's salary each"

Paid back?, what about the risk issue involved here, do founders have to expose their money (if they have) to launch the startup?, don't really understand\n

Author: dougw
Content: I just watched Revolution OS.  Really enjoyed it.  Indeed it is somewhat of old news to many of us, but it is also nice to see the faces and personalities driving the GNU, Linux, and FOSS movement as a whole.
